taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For Abram P. Garber, 1838–1881, of Columbia, Pennsylvania, noted for his contributions to the flora of Florida]

bio:treatment.discussion: The close relationship between Garberia and Liatris has been long recognized. T. Nuttall (1822) included G. heterophylla in Liatris sect. Leptoclinium (as L. fruticosa Nuttall). Garberia is distinct by its shrubby habit and karyotype (L. O. Gaiser 1954).

references.reference: Curtiss, A. H. 1881. Chapmannia and Garberia. Bot. Gaz. 6: 257–259.
